/************************************************************************************************************************************************************
 * @file Ex_16_43.cpp
 * @brief Exercise 16.43: Using the function defined in the previous exercise, what would the template parameter of 
 * g be if we called g(i = ci)?
 * @date 2024-02-14
 * 
 * @copyright Copyright (c) 2024
 * 
 *************************************************************************************************************************************************************/

/************************************************************************************************************************************************************
 * g(i = ci) // operator=() returns lvalue reference, so T is int &, void g(int & val) is instantiated
 * 
 *************************************************************************************************************************************************************/
